metadata.name: Flower Garden
metadata.description:
This work of art is the work of Iranian artist Awad Ali Mohajer, which is mixed with digital art.
There is no physical version of this work in the world, and this is the only version of this work mixed with handicrafts and digital art.
This art is originally known as the art of seven-color tiles in Iran.
And many people have known this art in the city of Isfahan in Iran.
But this is the work of an Iranian artist from Tehran who worked in Tehran for more than 50 years.
Many works of this artist have been installed throughout Iran and some parts of the world.
In fact, this Iranian artist is my father and I am proud of him.
I created the digital version of this artwork on August 17, 2005.
